Title: ServEvo
Description: ServEvo is an application that allows you to turn your computer into a complete development environment
HomeWiki:
ServEvo is an application that allows you to turn your computer into a complete development environment

You can control your défault applications like :

  • WampServer2
  • EasyPHP12
  • FileZilla Server
  • FreeSMTP

ServEvo v0.0.4 is out, check it !

Changes : http://servevo.codeplex.com/releases/view/99279
Language : English (not fully) supported since v0.0.3 !

In future versions:
  • Multilingual support (English/French)
  • We will be able to create and manage PHP Cron Jobs
  • We will be able to configure all of these services through the GUI
  • Save activity of the application log (new window?)
  • We are going to be able to download in the cloud components (such as apache, mysql, and others ...) and keep them up to date
